 707:     """
 708:     Smart dispatcher for fast corner interpolation with full feature support.
 709:     
 710:     Automatically selects the appropriate kernel based on input shapes.
 711:     Supports all combinations of:
 712:     - Single vs multi-channel
 713:     - Grid vs flat coordinates
 714:     - Same vs per-channel coordinates
 715:     - Global vs per-channel border modes
 716:     - Global vs per-channel distance modes
 717:     - Feathering support
 718:     
 719:     Args:
 720:         corners: Corner values. Can be:
 721:             - Tuple/list of 4 scalars for single channel
 722:             - Array of shape (4,) for single channel
 723:             - Array of shape (4, C) for multi-channel
 724:         coords: Coordinates. Shape determines behavior:
 725:             - (H, W, 2): Grid coords, same for all channels
 726:             - (N, 2): Flat coords, same for all channels
 727:             - (C, H, W, 2): Grid coords, per-channel
 728:             - (C, N, 2): Flat coords, per-channel
 729:         border_mode: Border mode(s):
 730:             - int: Same for all channels
 731:             - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)
 732:         border_constant: Border constant(s):
 733:             - float: Same for all channels
 734:             - list/array: Per-channel constants, shape (C,)
 735:         border_feathering: Feathering width (0.0 = no feathering)
 736:         distance_mode: Distance metric(s) for 2D border computation:
 737:             - None: Use ALPHA_MAX (default)
 738:             - int: Same for all channels
 739:             - list/array: Per-channel modes, shape (C,)
